data.prayer: Father, encourage the 34,322 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Luapula, Zambia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Luapula to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Luapula to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Luapula, Zambia.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Gujarati people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 34,322 believers in Luapula, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 137,700 souls in Luapula and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Luapula, Zambia from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

location.name: Luapula
location.people_groups_list: Mbowe, Simaa, Arab, Lebanese, Sala, Kxoe, Xun
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mbowe (800), Simaa (9,200), Arab, Lebanese (3,800), Sala (43,000), Kxoe, Xun (200)
